turns.query: SELECT DISTINCT prescriptions.drug FROM prescriptions WHERE prescriptions.hadm_id IN ( SELECT admissions.hadm_id FROM admissions WHERE admissions.subject_id = 10005817 and admissions.dischtime is null ORDER BY admissions.admittime DESC LIMIT 1 ) AND prescriptions.starttime = ( SELECT DISTINCT prescriptions.starttime FROM prescriptions WHERE prescriptions.hadm_id IN ( SELECT admissions.hadm_id FROM admissions WHERE admissions.subject_id = 10005817 and admissions.dischtime is null ORDER BY admissions.admittime DESC LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY prescriptions.starttime DESC LIMIT 1 )

turns.question: Which medications were started today for patient 10039831 that were not started yesterday?
turns.query: SELECT prescriptions.drug FROM prescriptions WHERE prescriptions.hadm_id IN ( SELECT admissions.hadm_id FROM admissions WHERE admissions.subject_id = 10039831 ) AND datetime(prescriptions.starttime,'start of day') = datetime('2100-12-31 20:00:00','start of day','-0 day') EXCEPT SELECT prescriptions.drug FROM prescriptions WHERE prescriptions.hadm_id IN ( SELECT admissions.hadm_id FROM admissions WHERE admissions.subject_id = 10039831 ) AND datetime(prescriptions.starttime,'start of day') = datetime('2100-12-31 20:00:00','start of day','-1 day')

turns.question: Which additional medications were started today that were not started yesterday?
turns.query: SELECT DISTINCT p.drug FROM prescriptions p WHERE p.hadm_id IN ( SELECT a.hadm_id FROM admissions a WHERE a.subject_id = 10039831 ) AND datetime(p.starttime) > datetime('2100-12-31 20:00:00')
turns.answer: vial; pantoprazole; sodium chloride 0.9%  flush; 5% dextrose

q_tag: What is the new prescription of patient {patient_id} [time_filter_global2] compared to the prescription [time_filter_global1]?

turns.question: What medication(s) was prescribed two or more times during patient 10004235's current hospital admission?
turns.query: SELECT T1.drug FROM ( SELECT prescriptions.drug, COUNT( prescriptions.starttime ) AS C1 FROM prescriptions WHERE prescriptions.hadm_id IN ( SELECT admissions.hadm_id FROM admissions WHERE admissions.subject_id = 10004235 and admissions.dischtime is null ORDER BY admissions.admittime DESC LIMIT 1 ) GROUP BY prescriptions.drug ) AS T1 WHERE T1.C1 >= 2

turns.question: Which additional medications have been ordered at least twice this admission?
turns.query: SELECT T1.drug FROM ( SELECT prescriptions.drug, COUNT( prescriptions.starttime ) AS C1 FROM prescriptions WHERE prescriptions.hadm_id IN ( SELECT admissions.hadm_id FROM admissions WHERE admissions.subject_id = 10004235 and admissions.dischtime is null ORDER BY admissions.admittime DESC LIMIT 1 ) GROUP BY prescriptions.drug ) AS T1 WHERE T1.C1 >= 2
